posts.post_content:
My favorite card, one of the best (if not the best) Naya creatures. T1, [Birds of Paradise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Birds of Paradise) -> T2 Woolly -> T3 [Scourge of the Nobilis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scourge of the Nobilis) or [Knight of New Alara](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight of New Alara) and swing with either a 7/6 lifelink or a 8/7 on third turn.  
  
I also love the flavor of it, despite it being a vanilla creature. Amazing manliness: Imagine waking up surrounded by gifts everyday. You know that's awesome.
posts.html:
My favorite card, one of the best (if not the best) Naya creatures. T1, Birds of Paradise -> T2 Woolly -> T3 Scourge of the Nobilis or Knight of New Alara and swing with either a 7/6 lifelink or a 8/7 on third turn.

I also love the flavor of it, despite it being a vanilla creature. Amazing manliness: Imagine waking up surrounded by gifts everyday. You know that's awesome.
